inn1.comm: good start, right up there and moving in from outside off stump, looking for some inswing, Tharanga shuffles across and gets behind the ball in defence
there's the movement he wants, full and swinging away off a great length outside off stump, suckering Tharanga into a play and miss
fullish again outside off stump, Tharanga gets half-forward, opening the face of the bat and nudging it down to third man for one
full again, swing, slow track it seems today, Jayasuriya gets forward and gently drives to mid-off
back of a length outside off stump, pitches and moves away, Jayasuriya shuffles to off and lets it pass
overpitched outside off stump, he moves a step forward, sees the length well, and punches in the gap at cover, no stopping that
short of a length outside off stump, bang on target, Tharanga hops up and defends it down in front of point
short of a length outside off stump, he oversteps looking for movement and bounce, Tharanga shuffles across and leaves it be
banged in really short down leg stump, very wide in fact, and the ball is so wide that it deviates way past Gilchrist
good length, fuller on off stump, Tharanga turns it to square for one
good ball, fullish on off stump, encouraging the drive, but Jayasuriya uses the soft hands to nudge it in front of mid-off and calls for the easy single
overpitched outside off stump, he gets forward and square-drives, but cant beat Clarke at backward point
good length outside off stump, he gets to the pitch and pushes gently to Hussey at mid-off and chances his arm, which is off anyways, so thats an easy run
good bouncer! Short  on the stumps, forcing Jayasuriya down on his haunches as the ball sails over his right shoulder
good length on off stump, Tharanga gets over it to counter the swing and turns it uneasily to square leg
good length outside off stump, pitches and moves away as Tharanga gets a good stride in and shoulders arms
good length just outside off stump, he comes forward and defends, and gets an inside-edge to short fine leg, Hogg moves well and keeps them down to just the single
strays down leg stump, Jayasuriya doesnt time his tickle well enough and Gilchrist moves well to cut off runs
back of a length outside off stump, asking him to drive, but he shoulders arms
back of a length, moving into off stump, Tharanga gets behind it and defends, turning the face of the bat as the ball rolls in front of midwicket
banged in short down leg stump, Jayasuriya hooks, doesnt time it well but the top-edges flies over Gilchrist down to fine leg for four
now its a fuller one outside leg stump, the yorker, which he tries to flick to the on side, misses and Tait asks the question, but it clearly pitched outside leg
strives for the yorker again but ends up bowling it way outside leg stump
good length this time on off stump, Jayasuriya gets well forward and pushes softly past mid-off for an easy brace
good length on middle and off, seaming away, but he gets behind  the line and pushes down to mid-on for one
short of a length on middle and leg, he gets behind the ball and taps it down into the ground outside leg
full outside off stump, he pokes at it tamely and gets an inside-edge to square leg
drifts down leg stump, just tickles the pad as he tries to flick, Gilchirst fumbles and they call for the sharp single, well run
short of a length outside off stump, keeping him off the front foot, and he gets back and leaves it be for Gilchrist to collect

gone! Good length outside off stump, moving in, Jayasuriya stands rooted and gets caught on the front leg pretty much in front of about leg stump, and after a couple seconds umpire Doctrove raises the finger! The dangerous Jayasuriya goes to Bracken!
good length on off stump, he gets behind the line and defends back down the track
back of a length outside off stump, good swing, Sangakkara covers off and shoulders arms
a tad wider of off stump, swinging away, left alone
outside off stump on a good length, he gets forward and raises the bat to let is pass
short of a length, he stands and flashes the extravagant flash, theres a thick edge but no gulley, and gets one to third man

gone! Tough call - pitches on a good length just outside off stump, moves in, Sangakkara stands behind the line and defends, misses, the ball shaves in hits him on the knee roll, everyone appeals and after a while Aleem Dar raises the finger! I have doubts over the height of that ball, looked like it may have gone over the stumps, but for now Sangakkara has to go!
oh ho ho, a bouncer to welcome him! McGrath drags one short, gets good carry to Jayawardene, who thinks about the pull but gets in tangle as it sails past hime
back of a length outside off stump, moves in very close to off as Jayawardene leaves it be
back of a length outside off stump again, left alone
full, swinging, outside off stump, Tharanga drives loosely and gets beaten
back of a length outside off stump, moves in, Tharanga defends into the covers
lovely! Bowling! Full again, moving in, Tharanga lunges at it and misses as it beats the bat

edged and gone! Set him up with a couple inswingers, this time he fires it full and gets it to seam away as Tharanga pushes forward, and the edge is snapped up by Hayden at first slip, taking it very low even as Ponting from second dives in front of him!
wide down leg stump, Gilchrist collects
wow! Full outside off stump, pitches and swing in very close to off as Silva shoulders arms
inswinger moving down leg stump, he looks to flicks and manages one off the pad to short fine leg as Gilchrist does the fielding himself
back of a length outside off stump, he gets behind the line and defends back down the track
back of a length outside off stump, nudged off the back foot to point
back of a length outside off stump again, he gets over it and defends to cover
bounced down leg stump, down goes Silva to let it pass him
good length outside off stump, Silva comes onto the front foot and defends compactly
back of a length outside off stump, he goes forward then back and pushes to cover, great over from McGrath
good length outside off stump, he plants the front leg forward and leaves it be
straighter one on about middle and off stump, he gets over it and flicks gently to mid-on, thinks about the call but resists
good length outside off stump, a lot of movement away as the batsman leaves it alone
good length outside off stump, presents the full face of the bat and drives to mid-off
full on about middle and off stump, flicked straight to midwicket, cant beat the man there
full on off stump, looking for movement, Jayawardene gets well over it and turns to the on side, Bracken fields it himself
short of a length outside off stump, sits up, Silva chases it and gets beaten
down leg stump, he tries to tickle it fine but the ball clips the pad
short of length, pitches outside off stump and really sits up, forcing Silva back and thats the bouncer for the over, say the umpires
shot! Fractionally overpitched this time, Silva gets forward and drives the half-volley past mid-off for four
back of a length outside off stump, moves sharply down leg and catches him defending
good length outside off stump, he thrusts himself forward to smother any movement McGrath's aiming at, and defends it down to point
good ball, slower and back of a length outside off stump, angles past Jayawardene and then straightens, forcing him to hold back on his shot
back of a length again, this time there's no movement and Jayawardene pushes it  off the back foot with soft hands, the ball runs to gulley
a tad fuller, good length, moves past Silva's tame attempt at a forward prod
full and angled across the stumps, tempting him to fish or drive at it, but Tharanga is wise to the task and shoulders arms with a stride forward
again angled past him and he gets a look in at it and shoulders arms
good length on off stump, drawing him forward, theres a thick edge all along the ground to gulley this time
back of a length outside off stump, Jayawardene gets up and defends down into the ground outside off
back of a length outside off stump as usual, again he gets up and defends to point with a firm 'No, wait!" to Silva
yowza! McGrath opts for a long-hop on off stump, and in a flash Jayawardene gets over it, pulling powerfully past square leg for four
as expected, fuller outside off stump and he comes forward and pushes into the covers confidently
there's another attempted bouncer down leg stump, moves down, Jayawardene chases with the pull, doesnt connect well and its wide of Gilchrist for four more
fuller outside off stump, moves in, he gets over it and defends back down the track
drifts down leg stump, he gets well forward flicks across the line but cant beat square leg
short of a length outside off stump, kicks off the surface, Silva's feet go nowhere as he flashes at it, surprised by the bounce, and the thick edge fairly speeds over slip for four
really short of length on middle and off stump, he gets forward and ducks down
another short one outside off stump, but this time Silva gets right over it, spanking an excellent square cut smack in the gap at point
surprise, surprise, a frustrated Tait bounces him outside leg stump and a wide is called
much better, full in the blockhole, Silva gets over it and flicks to mid-on
short-pitched outside off stump, he swivels on the pull and connects with air, stare from Tait
fraction short and wide, Jayawardene rolls the wrists and cuts it down in the gap at gulley for one to third man
fuller outside off stump this time, Silva gets over it and defends to the off side, telling his captain to stay put
good length outside off stump, he covers off and shoulders arms
good length outside off stump, he lunges forward and defends, the ball runs along the ground to third man
back of a length just outside off stump, Jayawardene eyes it up and leaves it be close to his body
even closer to off stump, on a length, he covers off and shoulders arms once more
overpitched on leg stump, flicked straight to midwicket
fuller this time on off stump, pushed down the ground, balls slows up and they pinch a quick single
short of a length outside off stump, chopped to point
full and wide down leg stump, wide called
fullish outside off stump, he gets forward and pushes into the gap between cover and point and runs hard for two
overpitched on off stump again, nicely driven back down the ground, mid-off moves across and keeps them to one
full on off stump, he gets forward and jams it down
tossed up down leg stump, Silva sweeps past square leg
quicker and flatter outside off stump, driven to cover
tossed up on the stumps, spins in, Silva goes back and defends it solidly
looped up on off stump, defended back
quicker and fuller on off stump, turned to square leg
fizzed up just outside off stump, defended
back of a length on off stump, turned to square leg
fuller on middle and leg, nicely flicked into midwicket for one
beaten by one that lands on a good length outside off stump and moves just a little
good length on off stump, turned with the wrists to Clarke at square leg for the single
strays straighter on middle and leg, and Silva works it behind square out to McGrath in the deep, who fires in a throw over Gilchrist's head and nobody backs up, so a second is given up
fuller on off stump, defended back to Symonds
short on off stump, no spin, he gets down and pulls past square leg
tossed up on off stump, Silva sweeps but cant beat Clarke at short fine leg
shorter, spinning into the ribs, he shuffles and looks to pick one in front of Clarke, but Jayawardene wisely says no
nicely looped up on middle and off, the wrong 'un, defended back by Silva
quicker on middle and off, he uses the feet and drives to mid-on
tossed up on a nice length just outside off stump, forcing Silva to get well forward and defend
good one, straighter on the stumps, pushed to mid-off
back of a length outside off stump, he waits for it and opens the face to run it down to third man
strays down leg stump, Silva clips it around the corner and old Pidgeon has some flying to do down at fine leg...and lo and behold, he uses the boot to save four
good length outside off stump, he comes forward and defends
good length again on off stump, played softly in front of point
steams in, locks swaying in the wind, bends his back, grunts, its full and Silva square-drives to backward point
tossed up, driven to mid-off off the front foot
tossed up, and again he gets forward and drives to the man at mid-off
this one's shorter and quicker on middle and leg, awkwardly played past a diving Clarke at square leg
dances out, Hogg sees him and fires it wide and quick, Silva reaches out and chops to backward point
loops up the wrong 'un out the back of the hand, well picked and driven to cover
straighter on the stumps, picked and flicked to square leg for one
nicely done, strays down the wrong line and Silva helps it on its way with a good little deflection to fine leg
too straight again and Silva works it fine for a single
better line, more off stumpish, Jayawardene shufles and flicks to square leg
oversteps this time, the balls on off stump and he works it to square leg
good length on off stump, flicked in the air to midwicket but its safe
drifts down leg stump and its paddled away in the air behind square
quicker, by Symonds standard anyways, and Silva comes forward and defends back down the track
tossed up on middle and off, turned to Clarke at square leg
tossed up on middle and leg, turns down as he looks to tickle it
quicker, comes down and spins in, Jayawardene gets it off the pad and it hits his back leg, he then deflects it as it rolls towards leg stump
tossed up on a length, defended
quicker on off stump, pushed into the covers
short and wide, and he cuts nicely out to deep point
on a length, spins in, Silva makes room and cuts through point for an easy couple
tossed up, comes out a high full toss outside off stump, he smashes it to short third man, who fumbles and allows two
fizzed up on off stump, defended
tossed up invitingly again, but he defends
a tad shorter, spins in, and Silva's saved by the inside-edge back onto the pads, well bowled
quicker and fuller on middle and leg, turned in front of short square leg
tossed up on the stumps, he flicks to Symonds at mid-on
just a fraction shorter, spins in, but he goes back and pulls past mid-on for a brace
nicely done, spins in off a length, very close to off stump, but he goes back and plays it right in front of Gilchrist's gloves for one
tossed up full on leg stump, swept down to fine leg for one
tossed up on off stump, Jayawardene gets down onto one knee and sweeps through square, Hussey in the deep moves quickly and keeps them to just one
tossed up on off stump, pushed to backward point, no chance of a run there
tossed up just outside off stump, he comes forward and pushes at it gently, and the inside-edge roll past leg stump
fuller and faster on off stump, he gets down and sweeps in front of the stumps for one, with the spin
slower, he waits for it and then opens the face of the bat, steering to backward point
flatter trajectory, he rocks back and cuts to Hogg at short third man
quicker on middle and off, he goes back and works it to square leg
tossed up on off stump, defended, and a very good over comes to an end
tossed up, he uses the feet well and flicks out to Tait at deep midwicket
comes out, Hogg sees him, fires it quicker and Silva has to defend it back
nicely done, tossed up on off stump, Silva defends it
well struck, tossed up on middle and off, down he goes, sweeping hard in the gap behind square for four
looped up on off stump, played back to Hogg
tossed up again on off stump, he sweeps past square leg for one
tossed up outside off stump, he pushes to cover
tossed up again, down he goes, getting the front leg out and sweeping with the spin to square leg
quicker outside off stump, chopped to point
again looped up, and Silva brings up the 100 for Sri Lanka with a deft sweep down to McGrath at fine leg
quicker through the air outside off stumo, pushed into the covers
tossed up, he uses the feet and drives in the air towards mid-off, but it lands safely
begins with a bouncer just outside off stump, Silva ducks down as it sails over his helmet
short of a length outside off stump, gets over it and chops wide of Clarke at backward point, who moves quickly and cuts it off
fuller on off stump, shuffles and flicks into midwicket, where Hodge does the fielding and flicks in a throw back to the stumps but misses
close, very close! Dragged in somewhat short, comes in, Jayawardene pulls just over short midwicket's head
back of a length, opens the face and runs it fine, but has to contend with an athletic Hayden at short third man
positive shot, came down a step, picked up a good length delivery and hammered it over mid-off, one bounce and four
fullish on off stump, shuffles and drives straight to Bracken at mid-on
lovely shot, overpitched outside off stump, Silva gets down and executes a cover drive in the gap at cover, and Tait continues to bleed runs
shorter one now, on about off stump, but instead of pulling over midwicket he hits it into the ground in front of square leg
too full on leg stump, and this time Silva cant put it away, just finding short midwicket
good yorker-length ball on leg stump, dug out back down the track to Tait
back of a length outside off stump, he hops across and pushes it down to backward point
good length outside off stump, shapes to sweep, but has to change his shot to steer to backward point
short, he pulls across the line but cant beat Hussey at short midwicket
short of a length on off stump, he stands up and works it around the corner for one, well played
shortish again, not enough to pull but he does so anyway, almost falling over, ends up hitting it into the ground wide of square leg
full on leg stump, down he goes, paddling it around the corner, no fine leg, and thats four
back of a length on off stump, an aggressive on-drive this time but straight to mid-on
good length outside off stump, driven to Hayden at point, who initially moves right and then dives back to his left to save runs
fuller outside off stump, he gets down and guides it to backward point
shot, man! Full and moving down leg stump, woeful delivery from Tait with fine leg up, and Jayawardene flicks it away for four
full and wide, down leg stump, and called
slower one good length outside off, driven to point
fifty up for Jayawardene, and the 100-run stand, with an authorititative hook shot well over deep backward square leg, immense shot for half a dozen
full on leg stump, easy pickings for him to clip it out to the man on the ropes for two
good start, shaping one across him, he plays and misses
slower one, beats him again with the angle, sits up a little too, well bowled
quicker one off an excellent length, squares up Silva as he plays for the turn
good length on off stump, Silva hurries to defend it to point
back of a length, slower ball, enough room for him to open the face and place it wide of Clarke at backward point
fuller, wider, and the angle beats Jayawardene's bat too as Gilchrist whips off the bails for fun
full on off stump, he just nudges it to mid-off to raise his fifth ODI half-century, and fourth in this tournament, well played, sir
overpitched outside off stump, Jayawardene square-drives out to deep point for one
overpitched well wide of off stump again, now Silva flashes an airy square-drive in the gap out to Hussey near the ropes
short one, bouncer outside off stump, he shapes to pull, misses,  gets hit high on the arm and picks up a run
half-volley outside off stump, driven square of the wicket for an easy single
looks for the yorker, comes out a low full toss on leg, nicely flicked past square leg for an easy couple
flat on middle and leg, he shuffles and works it out to McGrath at deep backward square leg
slowly tossed up outside off stump, pushed to mid-off
quicker and flatter on middle and leg, he looks for some sort of paddle-pull, bobbled up in the air and down to fine leg
tossed up on middle and leg, swept out to deep square again
short and wide, asking for trouble, he cuts hard in the air behind square, the balls   travelling fast, Hayden covers a lot of ground, dives, and saves the extra run, excellent effort
looped up on off stump, and Silva gently pats it back down the track past Hogg
Silva advances, drives hard but finds the fielder at short cover
a bit of width outside off, Silva cuts hard and Hussey dives at third man to save a certain boundary
drifting on the legs, Jayawardene nudges it to fine leg
Silva gets down on his knees and sweeps it hard, square of the wicket
pushed with soft hands to short cover and the batsmen set off for a quick single, excellent running by these two
tossed up on the pads, Silva waits on it and sweeps it fine
tossed up on the pads, nudged to the on side
Silva gets forward and steers it to Tait at point, takes off immediately
flatter on middle and leg, turned towards square leg for an easy single
reverse sweep but not well placed, Tait picks it up at point
turned to the on side, they are picking the runs easily here
delicately dabbed to third man, the balls races away towards the fence and Tait runs in from point to cut it off, good commitment in the end
pushed on off stump and driven easily to long-off
swept but straight to short fine leg
swept again but just a little wide of short fine leg, takes the single
Jayawardene steps down and lofts it towards deep extra cover
pushed off the front foot to the off side
turned away towards short midwicket
tossed up on middle and leg, he gets adventurous with a reverse sweep but makes a hash of it
goddim! Tossed up on middle and leg, now he prefers the more orthodox sweep, but mistimes it and the top-edge is easily gobbled up by Clarke at short fine leg, success for Hogg
tossed up full, he uses he feet well and flicks to midwicket to get off the mark first ball
well bowled, looped up on a length and Jayawardene has to defend it
nicely done again, a tad flatter and he works it straight to square leg
touch shorter and Jayawardene gets down low, pulling through square leg out to Hussey for one to keep hold of the strike
tossed up outside off stump, Jayawardene comes to the pitch and drives down to long-off for one
flatter one comes into him as he goes back and pushes it to Clarke
tossed up on a length, Dilshan stands and punches to mid-off for one
full and flat on middle and leg, Jayawardene turns it to short fine leg for one
quicker, flatter, and Dilshan cuts past point for the single
well bowled, flighted on middle and off and Jayawardene defends it back
much quicker, some good bouncer too and he misses out  on the cut
short again, he cuts but cant beat point
flighted on leg stump, he sweeps to short fine leg

well bowled, well stumped! Hogg tosses up a beauty on a great length, Jayawardene lunges forward, plays for turn, is beaten in the flight and all Gilchrist has to do it whip off the bails as the back leg's in the air, neatly done, and Hogg gets another key batsman
tossed up outside off stump, Arnold drives and is beaten in the flight
theres the googly, spinning in sharply and catching Arnold going back outside leg stump
full in the zone, he can only dig it out to Ponting at point
fullish outside off stump, Dilshan carves it out to deep cover of the back foot
overpitched again, and this time he can only drive to the man at cover
back of a length outside off stump, Dilshan drives off the back foot through point for one
fraction short and wide, Arnold nudges that in the air in the gap at gulley for one
banged in short outside off stump, Dilshan hooks, awfully mistimed, and the ball just bobs up for Hodge to pouch a dolly at square leg
tossed up on off stump, defended down the track
tossed up again, lunged at and the inside-edge gets him a quick single to midwicket
tossed up on off stump, Arnold turns it to square leg
tossed up again, now he drives back down the track to Clarke
well bowled, tossed up and again he just turns it to the on side
quicker one outside off stump, pushed to point for a risky single
short of a length over the top of off, he plays at it and the ball dies before Gilchrist
back of a length this time, and now he pushes it softly to mid-off for one
too full down leg stump, the yorker going wrong
very well bowled this time, yorker on leg stump, he jams the bat down and manages an inside-edge to leg
bowled 'em with another short one! Quick, too bouncy for Arnold, who stands rooted and gets cramped on the swipe, all tangled up, and the result is an inside-edge back onto the stumps
full on leg stump, cant put it away
strays to leg stump, and Kulasekara turns it off the pads for one out to the man on the ropes
beaten by one angled across the stumps, excellent length and carry again for him
and again, kicks off and seams past the bat off that superb length again

edged and gone! Bracken maintains his probing, moving line outside off stump, shaping one across Kulasekara to drive on the up, and the thick edge is snapped up very well by Hayden at a deep lone slip, down near his ankles, his second beauty of the day
oh ho ho, beats him too with one pushed across the stumps
fuller on off stump, he gets over it and pushes to cover
full and wide again, moving across the stumps, and this time he leaves it be
bounces him over the top of off stump, Maharoof arches the back to get out of harm's way, the ball brushes the shirt and Gilchrist appeals
short of a length outside off stump, he stands rooted and opens the face of the bat to run it down to third man, well played
good ball on a much fuller length, middle and offish, defended to midwicket
overpitched looking for another yorker, Bandara drives very neatly to Symonds moving around at mid-off
bounces him again with one over off stump, Bandara sways out of the way like an accomplished batsman
fuller this time on off stump, well played out to cover
full outside off stump, driven off the front foot to point
full outside off stump, driven loosely into the covers for a quick single
full, moving gently past the bat as Bandara chases it, Gilchrist whips off the bails
fraction shorter and wider, Bandara reaches for it and punches into the covers for  one
good length, moving past Maharoof who stands leaden-footed and misses it
fullish length, Maharoof drives to short cover, no chance of a run
back of a length outside off stump, he whirls a cut but fails to beat Clarke at backward point
full outside off stump, driven right to Symonds at mid-off
hello, baby! McGrath opts to rattle him with a long-hop outside off stump, but Bandara, cool as a pickle, stands and slams it over midwicket for half a dozen
overpitched outside off stump, and he square-drives to Clarke
yorker on about leg stump, pushed to mid-on
another yorker going down leg stump and now Maharoof has work to do, fast, and he doesnt do it badly either
tossed up outside off stump, pushed to mid-off
flatter, pushed to cover
comes out, using the feet well, and connecting well for his second six, this time swung away over wide long-on
quicker, flatter, spinning down leg stump, Bandara sweeps, misses, and scampers a leg bye to the off side
tossed up on a length, he makes room to cut but ends up hitting into the ground
tossed up, uses the feet to drive into the covers
right up there, full on middle and leg, and Maharoof times a perfect drive back down the ground for four
oversteps, bowls it outside off, just, and Maharoof heaves and misses
full outside off stump, he swings again and this time gets a genuine french cut and with fine leg up, thats four all the way...McGrath isnt happy at all
overpitched on off stump, now he gets down and swings it away through midwicket out to the sweeper for one
well bowled, yorker on off stump, Bandara backs away and just manages to get bat on it, chopping to point for the single
full toss, which is swung out past Hogg at midwicket for one more
he ends his spell with another, banging in a long-hop, Bandara pulls and can only balloon it up to Hogg at midwicket for a comfortable take
up there, Maharoof has a free hit and connects well, slamming it down to long-off
beaten this time, just standing and swinging across the line
edged away for four, Maharoof thrashes at it, and the ball flies wide of Hayden at slip, good runs these for Sri Lanka
all over, Bracken finishes the innings with a slower one that Maharoof just chips in the air down to Symonds at long-on

inn2.comm: good length to begin with on off stump, just pushed to mid-on
good length outside off stump, Gilchrist gets forward and pushes straight to mid-off this time
back of a length now, and he hops across to off and pushes to point
too full, swings down leg, and thats a good diving take from Sangakkara
swings into him, a no-ball too, and Gilchrist eases that into the midwicket region to open his account
thats a bad ball, a full toss outside leg stump that Hayden gladly tickles fine for four, first ball
he puts too much effort into this one, bowling it very full and wide outside off stump from over the stumps this time
better, much better, back of a length outside off stump and then moving over the top of off as Hayden stands tall and shoulders arms
slides down leg stump again, as Hayden misses out on the attempted nudge off the hips
back of a length on the stumps, worked to midwicket
good start from over the wicket, landing it on a good length and Gilchrist eases that to mid-off
back of a length just outside off stump, Gilchrist gets forward and pushes to mid-off once more
back of a length again, this time he stands and cracks it to point, cant beat the gap
tight delivery, back of a length on off stump, tapped back down the track
good length this time, pushed to mid-off
not a half-volley, but his timing is perfect, crunching a drive past mid-off for four
short of a length, left alone
short of a length, he shoulders arms covering off stump
banged in shorter on off stump, Hayden hustles to get behind it and defends it back
back of a length again, he gets up and defends to the covers
short of a length, up he goes, pushing off the back foot to cover
overpitches this time, but Hayden drives right to short extra cover
fraction short, Gilchrist cuts hard but cant beat short point
short of a length, steered to backward point
shorter this time, and he ends up chopping into the ground
good length on, pushed back down the ground to Maharoof
good length outside off stump, pitch is sluggish, Gilchrist drives and gets an inside-edge to short fine leg
overpitched, he drives to short extra cover
fuller length delivery, Gilchrist comes on the frontfoot and punches it to cover
slower delivery, good length, Gilchrist checks his shot at the last minute and defends it
fuller length delivery, he comes forward and punches it to cover
slower one, he oversteps, Gilchrist swings and misses
good length outside off stump, driven into the covers
slower ball, quite short, Gilchrist opens the face and runs it to third man
good length on off stump, Hayden gets behind the line and defends it back
back of a length outside off stump, he stands and defends in front of point
good length, square-driven to a diving Arnold at forward point
fuller, Gilchrist gets impatient and has an ugly heave at it, its mistimed and spooned up and over to third man, no pace in the delivery to hit
banged in a fraction short, Hayden pulls through midwicket, slow outfield does the rest
massive, was full outside off stump, Hayden aims to go long, and does so very well, clubbing it over mid-on for six
shorter this time, he pulls impatiently but cant get it past the on side
short of a length from around the stumps, another no-ball, Gilchrist just defends to the off

dropped! Fernando serves up a slower ball, Gilchrist doesnt read it, gets back and across and pushes at it early, the ball goes to Arnold at short cover, he jumps up, gets fingers to it, and lets it slip
well timed, overpitched and Gilchrist punches back down between bowler and umpire for four
back of a length, angling into him, he hops up and defends
good length outside off stump, he comes forward and drives to cover
quicker one, comes in off a short length, squaring him up totally, leading edge goes safely through the vacant gulley region
back of a length outside off stump, he gets behind the line and pushes to point
fraction wide of off stump,  he waits for it and cuts late down to third man, and gets a well-run three
back of a length outside off stump, he waits for it and attempts a cut, but the lack of pace does him in, hits into the ground
short, he pulls, finds the man at deep mid-on for just the single
back of a length, driven off the back foot to short extra cover, Jayawardene
overpitched, Hayden drives to mid-off, where Kulasekara misfields, parrying the ball back over his head after the dive, bad bounce perhaps
fraction shorter, Hayden cuts hard to Kulasekara at mid-off again, who fields well second time around
full delivery on off stump, Gilchrist goes back and turns it to midwicket
well bowled, yorker, dug out to Jayawardene at short extra cover
short of length outside off stump, Gilchrist  hops to off and opens the face, gliding it - or was it an edge? - down to third man, who's very wide, for four
marginally overpitched outside off stump, and he square-drives to backward point
now he bangs in one short down leg stump, Gilchrist gets into position to pull, waits, waits - its very slow, you see - and then gets bat on it to pick up four to fine leg
pitches it very wide of off stump, Gilchrist gets down and reaches for it, cutting along the ground to backward point
overpitched, driven back to him
dragged in short, nicely pulled between midwicket and mid-on to raise the 50
again short, again pulled away, this time in front of square
back of a length on off stump, he gets back and across and pushes wide of mid-on for one
fraction short and wide, he goes back and opens the face, placing it behind point and gulley and running hard
back of a length, pushed straight to mid-off
back of a length on off stump, pushed to mid-off
back of a length outside off stump, pushed to mid-off
a fraction short, he hammers it across the line, no protection out in the deep and Hayden picks up another boundary
shot, sir! He over-compensates with a fuller one, in the zone to be hit, and Hayden follows through with a bunt down the ground to long-off
short of a length on middle and off, he shuffles and nudges it to mid-on for an easy single
back of a length on leg stump, tucked wide of square for a single
back of a length, pushed to midwicket
tossed up, driven to mid-on this time
tossed up, gets to the pitch, and tees-off with a biff over extra cover for half a dozen!
quicker, flatter on middle and leg, nudged to square leg

gone this time, and the bowling change pays off! Arnold tosses it up flat on off stump, Hayden gets down, eyeing the inviting gap over long-on, but swipes it to Dilshan at midwicket instead. Crucial breakthrough for Sri Lanka
tossed up on a length outside off stump, he hops back and defends it
back of a length on off stump, he goes back and tucks it to short fine leg for one
back of a length on off stump, Ponting gets behind the line and defends it back down the pitch
gets off the mark by late cutting a flat delivery down to third man for one
back of a length now from around the wicket, defended to cover
short of a length outside off stump, pushed to Bandara at mid-off this time
low full toss, square-driven to point
flatter one on off stump, Ponting goes back and turns it to short midwicket
tossed up on middle and off, flicked out to deep midwicket

gone, Arnold, and in the Powerplays! Fires one quicker outside off stump, Gilchrist thrusts the pad forward, the bat is late, gets hit in line of middle and off, every man in blue in the ring goes up, and Aleem Dar has little hesitation in raising the finger!
tossed up on middle and off, worked to midwicket to get off the mark
quicker, flatter, pushed back to Arnold
tossed up, he uses the feet and theres that trademark flick into the deep
short and wide, he leans into it and places it well behind square for two as third man runs around
good length outside off stump, he leans into it and pushes to cover
tad fuller, he gets the foot out and drives back to Kulasekara's left
full again, now he gets to the pitch and drives into the covers
oversteps, back of a length, Ponting reacts quickly and glides it down to third man
fuller outside off stump, he drives at it and gets undone by the uneven bounce
fuller, honing in on off stump, pushed back to Kulasekara
flipped up from over the stumps, full, Ponting lunges forward, gets an inside-edge to square leg for one
looped up nicely on off stump, Clarke gets forward and blocks it out
quicker through the air, Clarke times the drive nicely back past  Bandara to long-off
looped up again, he drives back down the track
fuller on middle and leg, swept fine for one
flighted up outside off stump, Clarke drives to Jayasuriya, back at mid-off
good length on off stump, no room on offer, Clarke gets over it in defence
straighter one, flicked to Tharanga at short midwicket
good length outside off stump, driven straight to Jayawardene at cover
good length again, Clarke drives back to Kulasekara
quicker, fuller, wider, Clarke flashes the drive, gets a thick edge, and the ball races down to third man
good length on off stump, driven to mid-on
tossed up, pitches and spins short, back he goes, waiting, and then punches through the off side gap for four
looped up, tighter line, Ponting gets over it and smothers the spin
flatter on off stump, flicked to Fernando at regulation mid-on
fizzed up on leg stump, swept but straight to short fine leg
looped up, driven to point
looped up invitingly, but Ponting prefers to defend to cover
back of a length outside off stump, a loosener, which Clarke shoulders arms to
fuller now, Clarke comes forward and drives, ending up with an inside-edge to square leg
short of a length on off stump, Clarke gets up on the toes, behind the line, and defends back to Fernando
shot, overpitched, and he gives it what it deserves, a classical drive through the covers to raise the 100
carbon copy of the shot, another half-volley is dispatched between cover and mid-off, all timing and control
quicker, back of a length outside off stump, he gets a stride in and shoulders arms
short and wide, cut to point, where Silva cops one on the neck as he dives
tossed up, Ponting sees mid-off is up, dances down, and clubs it down the ground
quicker, flatter, Ponting cuts behind square where Tharanga dives to his left and saves runs
tossed up, he waits for it and opens the face to run it down to third man
tossed up, he uses the feet again and chips over midwicket's head for three
quicker, spins into him as he makes room, dabs it towards short third man, Tharanga moves across, collects, fires in a good throw back to Bandara, but Ponting's just home safe
tossed up, Ponting defends towards points, opening the face of the bat
full on off stump, uses the feet well to drive into the covers
tossed up, Ponting drives down to long-off for one
flighted again, Clarke drives to Jayawardene at short extra cover
quicker one, he drives to short extra cover again
shorter and really wide, he reaches across and dabs it wide of point for a single
he comes out, Bandara sees him and bowls wide, Clarke chases and nudges to point
flatter, spins away and Ponting cuts into the covers
tossed up, Clarke uses the feet well and cover-drives for four, wonderful to watch
looped up, this time he pushes between cover and point, but both men move well to stop
flighted up, he defends well
looped up, no room to cut or drive and Clarke thrusts bat and pad together
tossed up outside off stump, Ponting gets across and plays with soft hands
tossed up down leg stump now, Ponting misses out on the sweep
flatter line, cut to point
flat and quite wide, he chases it and dabs it past point for an easy single
tossed up, Clarke gets forward and then back, cutting to backward point
flat on the stumps, he adjusts and punches down to long-on for one

good catch! Bandara hustles in, loops one up, Clarke uses the feet well, drives hard to extra cover, but fails to keep it down, and Dilshan gets forward and clings on to it an inch before the ground. Clarke isnt convinced, stands his ground. Bandara knows its out. Both umpires confer and yes, it was taken cleanly, they agree, so Clarke walks off, shaking his head.
looped up outside off stump, left alone as it spins past him
looped up, defended
quicker one, Symonds drives out to long-off
looped up on the stumps, driven to mid-on
quicker one, he goes back and just gets bat on it, wouldve been interesting if he'd missed, gets one to square leg
full outside leg, Symonds clips it out to Tharanga moving out from long-on
straighter one, Symonds shuffles in front of the stumps and tentatively pokes it back
tossed up, he defends to cover
tossed up on off stump, he defends it back
quicker, flatter, now he mistimes the drive into the ground
straighter one, Symonds shuffles and works it behind square for one
flatter length, he goes back and punches to cover
looped up, he waits for it and finds the gap behind point for four runs, well cut
tossed up, Ponting uses the feet and on-drives to Fernando at mid-on
flatter on middle and leg, nudged to square leg
fired in on leg stump, Symonds drives back to Bandara
looped up, he too uses the feet and drives it down to long-off
tossed up on off stump, driven to Tharanga at short midwicket
tossed up, defended off the front foot
tossed up, defended off the front foot
flatter, shorter, he goes back and cuts into the covers, finding the gap and collecting two

tossed up, Symonds drives back down the track, Jayasuriya reaches out to his right, the ball kisses his fingers, and ricochets onto the stumps, the decision is referred and its decided that Ponting was just back in...whew, was close
flat, he goes back and drives to short extra cover
tossed up, Ponting drives past mid-off for one
full and flat on off stump, he uses the feet and drives to mid-on
spins away outside off stump, he opens the face and runs it to point
tossed up again, now he drives to cover
width offered and he cuts into the covers
tossed up wide, he goes for the booming drive, misses
short and flat, driven off the back foot to cover
too full on leg stump, swept past short fine leg, a poor throw from Maharoof at fine leg lets Symonds off, as he tripped and fell and was nowhere in the frame
oh shot! Dances down, collecting one on leg stump and depositing it into the long-on stands
quicker one, he defends off the front foot
tossed up, he defends off the front foot to the on side and runs hard
tossed up, defended to the off side
short and wide, he mistimes the cut and ends up dragging it to the leg side
comes out, Arnold fires it in quick, Ponting defends
spins into him, cheekily run off the face of the bat down to third man
tossed up, he comes down and chips it in the air over short midwicket
tossed up, Symonds waits for it and pushes in front of point for one
flat, wide, spins into him as he backs away to leg and punches out to the sweeper on the off side
tossed up, he lunges forward and gets beaten
full toss, and its rightly hammered away over cow corner for six
tossed up outside off stump, he rocks back and pushes to mid-off
flat, spins into him, he again rocks back and cuts out to deep point
flat, Symonds comes forward and defends it
flat again, spins in, Symonds rocks back and cuts with some power to bisect cover and point and beat the sweeper, wow
quicker, flatter and he gets back and across to push it back
begins short on the stumps, he rocks back and pulls to midwicket
spins into him, he opens the face and runs it to point
tossed up, defended off the front foot
straighter one on the stumps, he shuffes and plays it to short midwicket
straighter one on the stumps, he shuffes and plays it to short midwicket
flat outside off stump, he makes room and drives off the backfoot into the covers
short, cut to point
looped up outside off stump, Symonds gets down on one knee and powerfully sweeps through midwicket, against the spin
full toss on off stump, he gets down and bottom-hand jabs that over midwicket for four more, he's just having fun out there, Symonds
this one spins the other way, he chases it and gets beaten
well flighted on off stump, he gets over it and defends
slower one outside off stump, he cuts and misses again, and thats drinks for all
tossed up, he goes back and cuts out into the deep
straight on the stumps, he gets behind the line and pushes it back
tossed up on off stump, he gets down and paddles it fine for runs
tossed up, he plants the foot down and drives to long-on
tossed up, Ponting drives to his right, Dilshan dives and field
dragged short, now he pulls too hard through square
well flighted on leg stump, but paddled right to short fine leg
looped up full again, Ponting gets over it and smothers the spin
tossed up, defended
straighter one, he gets behind the line of the ball and pushes to mid-on
tossed up on middle and leg, on-driven for one
looped up, worked away to the on side
tossed up on middle and off, flicked to mid-on
fired on leg stump, Ponting paddles it down to fine leg
tossed up on middle and off, nudged to midwicket
flat, full, paddle-swept for one
tossed up, he opens the face and guides it to backward point
tossed up, he sweeps across the line and gets beaten
back of a length outside off stump, run down to short third man
short and wide, cut off the front foot past point for one more
too full, and Symonds straight-drives down the ground to long-on
slow, full on leg, worked to mid-on with utmost ease
fuller length delivery middle and leg, Ponting flicks it to deep mid wicket
oversteps, Symonds runs it off the face of the bat to third man
middle and leg, Ponting flicks it to deep mid wicket
tossed up on a length, he goes back and defends
straighter one, driven off the back foot to Dilshan
on leg stump, worked to short fine leg
short of a length outside off stump, steered past gulley
overpitched, and he lofts it over mid-off, top shot
straight, one a length, he gets up whips it to square leg for a riskly single, throw hits but Symonds is home safe
overpitched outside off stump, he welcomes the treat with a thumping cover drive that brings up his fifty, and that must feel good
short of a length, he opens the face and gets two to third man
back of a length, chopped down to third man to keep strike
tossed up, played back to Dilshan
straighter one, he goes back and pushes back to Dilshan again
drifts to leg stump, Symonds turns it around the corner for an easy two
tossed up, uses the feet, drives down to long-on
tossed up on leg stump, worked right to square leg
tossed up, lunges forward and defends to the off side
tossed up, cut to cover
tossed up, defended it back
tossed up on middle stump, played to midwicket
tossed up on leg stump, swept right to short fine leg
tossed up on leg stump, flicked out to deep mid-on
tossed up, gently pushed to point for a single
tossed up on middle and off, on-driven to mid-on
tossed up, driven to cover, misfield allows one
drifts to leg stump, Symonds clips fine
short, flat, going down leg, and he just swings it away behind square for four
tossed up, defended with ease
straighter one, pushed off the back foot to mid-on
looped up, he rocks back and cuts to point
spins away from him again, cut to that man once more
looped up, driven to cover
finished in style, Australia romp home! Tossed up, he clears the leg and sends it rows back over long-on!
